scripts.reinstall: bash -c 'rm pnpm-lock.yaml; rm -rf node_modules/@dqiu' && pnpm install
scripts.prelint: bash -c 'if grep -q "//.*\"include\":" tsconfig.json; then sed -i "s/\/\/.*\"include\":/\"include\":/" tsconfig.json; fi'
scripts.lint: bash -c "pnpm prelint && pnpm gts lint; exitError=$?; pnpm postlint; exit $exitError"
scripts.postlint: bash -c 'if ! grep -q "//.*\"include\":" tsconfig.json; then sed -i "s/\"include\":/\/\/ \"include\":/" tsconfig.json; fi'
scripts.clean: bash -c 'if [ $# -eq 0 ]; then tsc --build --clean; else tsc --build --clean $(printf "./packages/%s/tsconfig-package.json " $@); fi' --
scripts.compile: bash -c 'if [ $# -eq 0 ]; then tsc --build; else tsc --build $(printf "./packages/%s/tsconfig-package.json " $@); fi' --
